item.title: Chris Kempczinski, CEO of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, is asked if Kevin Ozan‚Äôs departure is related to the criminal RICO case targeting them.
item.description: Click this link to see the original LinkedIn post. Dear Mr. Kempczinski, Is Mr. Ozan‚Äôs departure related to the criminal RICO case targeting McDonald’s Corporation and if yes, to which extent is it related? (look at the screenshot üëá to understand) You also mention Mr. Ozan‚Äôs ‚Äúunwavering integrity,‚Äù could you please confirm he reported internally my stern warnings about the crimes McDonald‚Äôs is engaging into? As the CFO, he obviously should have understood McDonald’s Corporation is engaging in money laundering, shouldn’t he?

item.title: Email sent on 2022-05-12 to the F.B.I. and CCed to the U.S. Ambassadors to France and to China
item.description:
On 2022-05-12, I sent an email to the F.B.I. and CCed it to Denise BAUER, U.S. Ambassador to France, and Nicholas BURNS, U.S. Ambassador to China.

FROM : X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

TO : Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

CC : Denise Bauer (U.S. Ambassador), Nicholas Burns (U.S. Ambassador), [REDACTED: the email was CCed to three additional people]

SUBJECT: I shared a folder with the FBI containing evidence

DATE: 2022-05-12 at 23:20 Beijing time
